S.FORM: lokah ta kwara, t’aring ta la.
tuli! tatuk tunux.
lokah su psba biru.
tama kwara.
lokah ta kwara. kisa ga sba’an cimu nya psba biru sankenu kmayan nni’un ke ta Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的泰雅語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Tayal.

S.FORM: ba’un su mung ke na psba biru?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: psba biru, ini mu ba’iy. kayan cikah loyi ma?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: ini mu pungiy, hopa cikah hngiyan su ma?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: kita cahay kwara! pgluw kinang mlpuw loyi.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡！跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: myasa ci nlpuw mamu.
lpuw loyi. hopa cikah hngiyang mamu.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: iya htuw hngiyang. iya kayan ke.
agan biru mamu.
angu, psba biru.
agan bbrwan mamu.
psba biru, waya mu yngyan bbrwan mu la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: agan ccong mamu.
psba biru, waya mu yngyan ccong mu la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: ksiyu cikah ccong nya mluw m’was biru syaw su.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: syugiy cu cikah ccong su ma?
masu ta tkba biru la.
tehok cahay tkba’an ta, pkita ta ’nyan utux hngawan loyi.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: ima isu?
Piho kinang.
ima isu?
la’i cu nya Pasang, Hayung kinang.
S.TRANSL: I am Pasang’s son, my name is Hayung.

S.FORM: ima isu?
tkba biru cu nya Yukan, Wilang kinang.
S.TRANSL: I am a student of Yukan, my name is Wilang.

S.FORM: ima lalu su?
lalu mu ga Yuhaw.
ima lalu yaba su?
Yumin lalu yaba mu.
ima heya?
heya ga Watan.
heya ga suyan mu, Temu lalu nya.
S.TRANSL: He’s my brother, his name is Temu.

S.FORM: ima lalu nya?
lalu nya ga Toli.
Wasaw lalu nya?
angu, Wasaw lalu nya.
Piho lalu nya?
iyat, Take lalu nya.
ima c’oli haca?
heya ga Pisuy, heya ga yata mu.
ima c’oli haca?
heya ga lpyung mu, lalu nya ga Yayut.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Yayut。
She is my friend and her name is Yayut.

S.FORM: pisa kawas su micu?
mpu kawas mu micu.
pisa kawas nya heya?
mpu sa’ing kawas nya heya.
pisa kawas yaba su micu?
myiman kawas yaba mu micu.
pisa he kwara mtswe su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: sa’ing suyan mu ru utux sswe mu.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: kyan suyan su mlikuy?
ungat suyan mu mlikuy.
pisa he kwara utux sali mamu?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: payat he kwara sali myan.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: cyu su m’was biru inu?
nyu cu m’was biru Nango.
ima heya?
heya ga mama mu.
lalu cyu nya ptyawun mama su?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: heya ga kesacu.
ima c’oli haca?
heya ga suyan mu nerin.
cyu mtiyaw suyan su nerin?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: heya ga cyu mtiyaw beh pkhgup mga’ing.
mtswe sa’ing naha?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: iyat, naha ga lpyung.
’tayal su?
angu, Tayal caku.
’tayal bes su uyi?
angu, ana ga heya ga Bunun.
hlawax ci yaba su?
angu, hlawax ci kwara utux sali myan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: cyu m’was biru sswe su nerin la?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: ang, cyu m’was biru la.
kba kmayan ke Tayal sswe su?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: ang, kba kmayan ke Tayal kwara naha.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: pisa he kwara mtswe su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: tugan he kwara mtswe mu.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: cyu su mluw maki yaba yaya su?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: ang, nyu cu mluw maki yaba yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: cyu su mluw maki uba uya su?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ini, ini cu gluw naha maki.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: cyu su mluw maki ima?
nyu cu mluw maki yaba, yaya ru suyan mu mlikuy.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: kahun su inu mwah?
kahun cu Girang mwah.
cyu maki inu sali mamu?
cyu maki Girang sali myan.
inu ku knholang su?
knholang mu ga Nango.
cyu inu alang mamu?
cyu beh llyung Mklesan alang myan.
S.TRANSL: 我們的部落在葛蕾扇流域。
Our tribe is in the Greyfriars watershed.

S.FORM: knwan mosa su alang su?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: hngawan ’bagan ga mosa cu kryax.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: kinang ga, la’i na Tayal.
maha kenu kayan nya kisa?
mhtu wagi la, kilux ci kayan nya.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: skinut ci tanux?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: skinut ci, piyux cmi lukus.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: kilux ci tanux?
ini, nyu sbehuy la, sbehuy ci.
mcwa kayan nya kisa?
ini skinut ru ini kilux soni, ble ci.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: mcwa kayan nya kisa?
ungat yulung nya babaw kayan, nyu mhtu bengah la.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya tanux?
mswat walax nya micu, mhtu wagi lga, mhtu hongu lutux uyi la.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya beh kya?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: hopa behuy nya cahay.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: myasa kayan nya beh kya?
myasa ci, mhtu hopa wagi.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: mosa cu m’was biru la.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: skinut ci kayan nya, piyux cmi lukus.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: mosa cu mhtu tanux la.
mosa hopa walax nya kisa, aras ci ruku.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你一定要帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you must bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: mosa mwalax kisa?
waya cmu bicyu soni ci, ini ba’iy mosa mwalax kisa.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下可能就要下雨。
It just thundered, and it might rain later.

S.FORM: cyu mwalax la?
waya mwalax soni ci, nyu mswat micu la.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: cyu mwalax la?
yani hayi waya mwalax la, nyu mhoyi tu’iy.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: waya mwalax? ca nyu mhoyi kwara he su?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: cyu mwalax tanux, ini cu aras ruku.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: cyu su lokah ga?
hopa ci behuy nya, memaw ga’ing tunux mu sbehuy.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: cyu su lokah ga?
hopa ci wagi nya, memaw kging tunux mu bun wagi.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: waya cu mungiy maras bbrwan.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: syugay misu.
waya cu mungiy maras prahit.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: ini cu aras uyi, hata bayi.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: hata bayi bbrwan ma?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: aw, bayi cu ccong uyi.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: hata bayi knama ma?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: iyat cu, mnani cu sali la.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: waya cu mungiy skulu sbin. la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: helaw hayi hay skilux!
waya cu mungiy maras sbin la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: nanu s’onaw ta mani sbin mu.
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: lalu ni’un kryaxan su?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: kani cu pslokah kryaxan pwasan briu.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: lalu ni’un kryaxan su?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: nyu cu maras sbin soni, s’onaw ta mani cka wagi.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: hata mahiy boru ma?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: aw ga, nanu hata.
hata mahiy yakyu ma?
iyat cu, kita cu biru.
rogiy cu magan utux kagaw.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: aw, agan utux kagaw hani.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: rogiy cu magan tapang haca ma?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: nyu cu kmagaw, kayan Hayung haca mraw isu mosa magan.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Hayung to help you.

S.FORM: masu su kmagaw la?
masu cu kmagaw la.
ca su ini kagaw?
masu cu kmagaw la.
cla ci ssamaw uraw haca, haliy cmong cikah.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: aw, hala cu magan tapang.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: cla ci tobung haca, haliy cmong cikah.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: ini nya ha, nyu mu ini su’iy kmagaw cahay nya.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: lalu ptyawun su kisa?
mosa cu hkani psba biru.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: mosa su inu masu m’was biru?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: mosa cu mluw m’was lpyung mu.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: mosa inu heya masu m’was biru?
heya ga mosa mlngya ’sya.
cyu kya sali Ciwas?
nyu sali, uwah miyuk.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: cyu sali Yageh?
ini aki sali, lalu yaw su?
S.TRANSL: She’s not here. What do you want?

S.FORM: ima kwaca?
uba, Sayun kinang, gyahiy cikah lihun.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m Sayun, please open the door.

S.FORM: ima kwaca?
Yabung, Rimuy kinang, nyu cu mwah hkani isu la.
S.TRANSL: Yabung, this is Rimuy, I’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: bsya ta ci ini pkita la.
aw ha! krmatun misu ci. nahay uwah mtisan!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: tama ha, nbu cikah ocya.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: mhway su.
nbu cikah ocya.
talagay! ble ci nbun ocya mamu.
kani ta cikah bbway!
aw ga! myasa ci texan kwara bbway hani.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: ble ni’un bbway hani?
angu, ble ci ni’un.
masu phapuy kgabi yaya la, nahay uwah mani!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: angu, hala cu mema ’ba ha.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: iriy mani ru nbu, bali su c’oli.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: piyux ci waya mu ni’un la, tngi ci la.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I’m full.

S.FORM: lokah mani, iya cayux.
aw, ble ci ni’un.
mosa cu la, wahay misu mita babaw nya.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I’m leaving, I’ll see you next time.

S.FORM: aw, sgagay ta la.
gbyan ci la, mosa cu sali la.
uwah tisan babaw nya loyi!
thway mosa.
aw, ungat yaw su ga uwah tisan sali mu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: lokah ta kwara, kisa ga rasun cimu nya psba biru mosa ta alang Tayal mita bkis.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: myasa ci! ita ru bkis ga pkayan ta ke Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們跟耆老要說泰雅語。

S.FORM: obeh ta tehok la?
iyat kinga tehok la.
uba, nyu cami mwah mita isu la.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: talagay! kba cimu kmayan ke Tayal! talagay myasa ci!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說泰雅語啊!真是太棒了!
You guys speak Thai! That’s great!

S.FORM: lokah ta kwara, kisa ga rasun cimu nya psba biru mosa ta mtiyaw mayah lmyun.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: psba biru, mosa cami kwara myan.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, we all have to go.

S.FORM: uwah mlahuy kwara, aras y’aya mamu.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，帶著你們的工具。
Come and line up and bring your tools.

S.FORM: aw, psba biru, nyu cami maras y’aya la.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都帶工具了。
Yes, teacher, we’ve brought our tools.

S.FORM: nyu ta tehok la?
ini tehok nya, theya ci nya.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: isu usa kmikis ’sya.
aw, kinang mwah kmikis ’sya.
isu usa magan tapang psosaw piyit.
aw, kinang mosa psosaw piyit.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: lokah ta kwara, mosa ta mita yngayan ksinu kisa.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: talagay myasa! kusa ta kenu mosa?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: pgluw ta glgan basu mosa.
ble mlahuy kwara, lama ta bayi kipu la.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: angu.
gleng nya ga gluw piyit, suruw nya ga gluw m’u, ble nanak usa mita.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，自己好好參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: psba biru, mngungu cu m’u.
iya kngungu, nanu usa mita piyit isu.
S.TRANSL: Don’t worry, then you go and see the birds.

S.FORM: babaw utux tmuting lga uwah mlahuy kwara ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: ang, mhway su psba biru.
lalu waya su texan soni?
piyux ci m’u waya mu texan, piyux ci piyit uyi.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: nahay hayi, mosa ta la.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: ngwey cu cikah, m’wix ci kakay mu.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: s’un ta mosa mlngya ga?
ang, nanu hata la!
piyux ci c’oli nya nyu mlngya cahay.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: haca ga iyik ci ’sya nya, mlngya ta cahay lga yaca la.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: maha su kenu mwah?
khani cu kakay mwah.
lalu waya su glgan mwah?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: mnluw cu glgan basu mwah.
kusa su kenu mosa kyokay?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: kmuyit toruy yaba mu, glgan cu nya mluw mosa.
heya ga maha kenu mosa pwasan biru kryax?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: heya ga mluw toruy iyik uraw mosa pwasan biru.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: maha kenu mosa bayi rami uya su?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: mluw otobay mosa bayi rami.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: maha kenu mosa su Lanyiy?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: mluw cu xune mosa Lanyiy.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: maha kenu mosa Lanyiy heya?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: mluw glgan mlaka mosa Lanyiy heya.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: mluw lalu toruy mosa Takaw heya?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: mluw spito kisya mosa Takaw heya.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: mnluw kisya mosa Tayto heya?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ang, mnluw kisya mosa Tayto heya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: mnluw kisya mosa Tayto heya?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: iyat, mnluw glgan mlaka mosa Tayto heya.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: kyan glgan basu llingay hani?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: kyan, kura gleng khani lga texan su glgan basu la.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: cyu inu ku sobeh ci glgan iyik uraw cahay?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: ungat glgan iyik uraw nya cahay, nanak haya glgan su.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: pisa ryax nya mluw ta glgan basu ga tehok ta pwasan biru?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: mpu magan pungkang lga tehok pwasan biru la.
pisa ryax nya mluw ta spito kisya ga tehok ta Taycyu?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: utux tmuting lga tehok Taycyu la.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: bsya ryax nya kmuyit toruy mosa ta alang Ulay?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: sobeh utux tmuting.
mluw su glgan iyik uraw ga knwan tehok su sali mu?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: siga pusan pungkang.
kba su mluw zitengsya?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: kba cu mluw zitengsya.
kyan otobay su?
kyan utux otobay mu.
kyan otobay su?
ungat otobay mu.
ana cu mosa mita isu?
uwah, m’es lungan mu.
ana cu mosa mita isu?
laxiy uwah, ini piyux ba’un mu.
S.TRANSL: Don't come, I don't know much.

S.FORM: ungat yaw su ’lyan? ana cu mosa mita isu?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: ana, n_gon misu sali.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: ungat yaw su cuxan? aki cu mosa tkba isu yaw na lela na Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於泰雅族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I would like to ask you about the legendary stories of the Atayal people.

S.FORM: mosa cu rgyax cuxan, iyat cu kaki sali.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: pnungan mu ga piyux ci ba’un su knxan gaga lela na Tayal, smoya cu mosa tkba isu.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對泰雅族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you are very knowledgeable about the traditional customs of the Atayal and I would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: ini piyux knba’an mu, ana ga mosa misu sba’an kwara knba’an mu.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: ana misu galun lutux? maha kya ga mosa ba’un sbiru babaw nya.
S.TRANSL: 我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: ana, cikuy na yaw.
pisa kawas su micu la?
waya cu rima mhenas m’esu pgan spat kawas la.
mrkyas su ci.
henu la! nyu cu rima bkis la.
kahun inu knholan su?
kahun cu llyung Mklesan alang na Pyahaw.
S.TRANSL: 我來自葛蕾扇流域比亞毫部落。
I'm from the Bihue tribe of the Greyfriars.

S.FORM: Tayal nerin su uyi?
S.TRANSL: 您的太太也是泰雅族人嗎?
Is your wife also an Atayal?

S.FORM: iyat, heya ga Truku.
pisa kwara ke ba’un su kmayan?
kba cu kmayan ke na Tayal ru ke na Truku.
S.TRANSL: 我會說泰雅語和太魯閣語。

S.FORM: p’asun ci thoyay cu mwah mita tkba isu, ana su kmayan cikah gaga na mluyak?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: ana, mrkyas cu ga mosa cu mluyak rgyax kryax.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: mhway su, talagay myasa ci pnsba su soni.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝您，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: knayan misu ga calay ci ini kbrus kwara, kahun pnsba na bnkisan.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: tehok cahay tkba misu kisa. mhway su ci kwara pnsba su.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: iya cayux, tisan ta loyi.
mosa cu la, babaw nya ga smoya cu mung piyux hayi yaw na lela.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: myasa! thway mosa.
lokah su, lalu bisun su?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: bayi cu utux copu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: lokah su, lalu bisun su?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: bayi cu utux kbubu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: bayi cu copu, cyu mamu tbayi?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: kyan, pisa bisun su.
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: cyu mamu tbayi binto?
ungat, ini myan tbayi binto.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: bayi cu bwax.
pisa yubing bisun su?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: bi’iy cu tugan yubing.
bayi cu ngahi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: waya su’un tbayi la.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: bayi cu sa’ing syupan abura.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: utux ci syupan mhra la.
usa bayi cikah baying.
pisa king bisun su?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pisa king baying bisun su?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: sa’ing king bisun mu.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: bayi cu sa’ing nhun nira.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: nyu mhra tugan nhun, siy misu bi’iy kwara.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, you can have them all!

S.FORM: pisa pila utux yubing hani?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: utux yubing ga sa’ing kbhun.
kwara pila ga pusan utux, pusan lga yaca la.
mhway su.
cahay ga m’esu pgan magan pila.
twangay mu bayi cikah, siy tna’iy utux kbhun pila.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: kwara pila ga magan kbhun mpu.
siy cu galiy magan kbhun pila la ki?
kwani ga hmet ci la, ana su mhway cikah?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: ini ga, kwani ga waya mhway ci la.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: galun mu utux cnabu pang kiyay hani.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: pang kiyay hani ga tiyun pila, smoya su bayi binah nya loyi?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: ana cu ksiyu cikah pila su?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ana, pisa pila ksyugan su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: waya cu mungiy maras pila la, ana cu ksiyu cikah pila su?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ini cu aras pila uyi!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: waya cu mungiy maras pila la, ana cu ksiyu cikah pila su?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: iyat cu, pilaw knsyugan su pila mu ga ini caku bi’iy nya.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: ana cu ksiyu cikah lukus su?
ana, agan nanak.
ana cu ksiyu cikah biru su?
waya mu ksyugan Habaw la.
ksyugiy cu cikah zitengsya su ki?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: ana, ana ga wahiy caku ci matu cuxan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: mwalax la, ini cu aras ruku, ksyugiy cu cikah ruku su ki?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: utux ci ruku mu, siy ta s’un pcru la.
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: kwani ga knsyugan mu pilaw biru su, nyu misu wahan me la.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: biru lalu smoya su mita loyi ga kayan caku.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: knwan bi’an misu knsyugan mu pila?
S.TRANSL: 我什麼時候要還所借你的錢?
When do I have to repay the money I borrowed from you?

S.FORM: ana, texiy kyan pila su ga kayan caku.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: knwan bi’an caku knsyugan su pila mu?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: bi’an misu cuxan.
S.TRANSL: I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: knwan bi’an caku knsyugan su biru mu?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: iyat misu waya bi’an hesa la?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: bbrwan hani ga knsyugan su nya Wilang?
S.TRANSL: Did Wilang lend you this pen?

S.FORM: angu, knsyugan cu nya soni.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: bbrwan hani ga nwahan su ksiyu Masaw?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Masaw?

S.FORM: iyat, kwani ga mnayi yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: ungat cimu la, usa ksiyu cikah cimu Sima.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Sima.

S.FORM: ang hala cu ksiyu.
hay kmayan Yageh haca wahiy caku me pila mu.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Yageh to give me my money back.

S.FORM: pisa kwara pila knsyugan nya pila su?
S.TRANSL: 她總共向你借了多少錢?
How much has she borrowed from you in total?

S.FORM: mosa su inu?
mosa cu mayah ru muhi rami.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: lalu cyu su ptyawun?
nyu k’man ci la, nyu cu smlyat k’man, ksya’an mu ’sya kisa.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There’s too much grass, I’m cutting it, I’ll have to water it later.

S.FORM: hay magan cikah soki ru karoh mu aras cahay ma?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: cyu su ccyan inu?
cyu beh syaw lihun khu.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the door of the warehouse.

S.FORM: waya su spoxun kmoyah uraw la?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: waya mu spoxun kmoyah micu ci, naga cikah lga tbuxun mu la.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: ba’un kmyut nuhiy su rami la?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: nyu cahay kanrang ga ba’un magan la, cyu haca sina ga ini ba’iy magan na.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: waw! talagay knoyah su ngahi.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: haliy smku cikah khu mu ki?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: lalu cyu mamu ptyawun?
nyu cami cmi ami pkiyak ’cyux.
S.TRANSL: We’re releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: piyux ’cyux nya cahay?
iyik tara mu ga piyux ci kniyak mu ’cyux la.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: maha su kenu kmiyak ’cyux kryax?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: s’agan mu beta ’cyux cmu ’cyux kryax.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: s’agan su pnelu mosa mluyak?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: cmi cu t’oya kmiyak ksinu kryax, kruma ga magan cu patus ru maras cu hoyin mosa mluyak.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: cahay ga tu’iy nwahan biyak kahong.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: ca su ba’un?
kwe ga rapan na biyak kahong, nanu yaca cahay ga tu’iy nwahan na biyak kahong.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: helaw ta mosa mita t’oya ta, yani hayi cyu ciri ksinu la.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: ca su ba’un?
yani hayi cyu sokan hoyin la. nahay hayi hay ta mluw.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let’s follow them.

S.FORM: lalu cyu su kle’un?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: kwani ga rangay, wahan ta kmiyak olit.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: cyu su pcyan haca ga lalu kyaca?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: kyaca ga t’oya, s’agan mu ciri para.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: mhway gnalu na lutux bnkisan, piyux ci pnaga ta ksinu soni.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: angu ha! rasaw ta alang ta le’aw ta m’asu ru s’un mani.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let’s take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: ryax soni psba biru ga psba’an cimu san kenu kmayan ke Tayal ku ksinu.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的泰雅語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Tayal language today.

S.FORM: ryax soni psba biru ga psba’an cimu san kenu kmayan ke Tayal ku k’man.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的泰雅語怎麼說。

S.FORM: ryax soni psba biru ga psba’an cimu san kenu kmayan ke Tayal ku bway nni’un.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的泰雅語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Tayal language today.

S.FORM: iya abi.
iya kayan.
iya kani nni’un.
agan biru su.
agan bbrwan su.
agan biru bbrwan su.
skuy biru su.
skuy bbrwan su.
skuy nni’un haca.
skuy nnogun haca.
’ra ima bbrwan hani?
’ra mu.
’ra ima biru hani?
’ra na Yukan.
’ra ima ccong hani?
ini mu ba’i.
lukus Sabuw kyaca ?
iyat, oba Kumu kyaca
psba biru, ini cu aras biru. .
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: s’un mita biru ku m’was biru syaw su haca.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: wan purun bbrwan mu la .
bbiru enpit la.
ini texiy ccong mu la.
ksyugay misu ccong maku.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: mhngi ta m’was biru la, thoway mosa sali!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: ang, psba biru mhway su.
mhngi ta m’was biru la, sgagay ta la.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: psba biru sgagay ta la.
lokah ta kwara! lalu mu ga Tacyu.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Tacyu.

S.FORM: Tacyu, lokah su.
lokah ta kwara! lalu mu ga Yuming.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Yuming.

S.FORM: Yuming, lokah su.
kinang ga Amung, lokah su.
Amung lokah su, kinang ga Takung.
lokah su, kinang ga Batu.
Batu lokah su, kinang ga Asaw.
ima isu?
yaya caku nya Yuhaw, kinang ga Yabung.
ima isu?
sswe caku nya Yuhaw, lalu mu ga Uma.
S.TRANSL: 我是Yuhaw的妹妹，我的名字是Uma。
I am Yuhaw’s sister. My name is Uma.

S.FORM: ima heya?
heya ga psba biru mu, lalu nya ga Pasang.
ima c’oli haca heya?
suyan mu mlikuy heya, Take lalu nya.
heya ga Payang?
ang! heya ga Payang.
isu ga Take ga?
iyat, kinang ga Yawi.
ima ga Tengkang?
kinang ga Tengkang.
ima ga Yawi?
Yawi ga lpyung mu.
ima lalu suyan su knerin?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Habaw lalu suyan mu knerin.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Habaw.

S.FORM: ima lalu sswe su knerin?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Ipay lalu sswe mu knerin.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Ipay.

S.FORM: ba’un su lalu nya?
Toli lalu nya.
pisa kawas suyan su mlikuy?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: mpuw magan kawas nya.
pisa kawas sswe su mlikuy?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: magan kawas nya.
alang mamu ga kyan pwasan biru?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: kyan.
cyu su m’was biru beh pwasan biru alang su?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: ang, s’un cami m’was biru beh pwasan biru ga yani cami ci utux sali.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: ima mlikuy haca?
heya ga mama mu.
ima knerin haca?
heya ga suyan mu knerin.
ima la’i haca?
heya ga sswe mu mlikuy.
cyu mtiyaw lalu yaya su?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: heya ga cyu hetay.
cyu mtiyaw lalu yaba su?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: heya ga cyu psba biru.
heya ga sswe su mlikuy?
iyat, heya ga lpyung sswe mu mlikuy.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: heya ga suyan su knerin?
iyat, heya ga sswe mu knerin.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: pisa kwara c’oli utux sali naha?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: magan he kwara utux sali naha.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: pisa kwara la’i utux sali mamu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: payat kwara la’i myan.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: pisa kwara sswe su mlikuy ru sswe su knerin?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat sswe mu mlikuy, kyan tugan sswe mu knerin.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: pisa kwara suyan su mlikuy ru suyan su knerin?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat suyan mu mlikuy ru suyan mu knerin.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: pisa kwara mtswe su?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat mtswe mu.
mtswe cimu?
ang, heya ga suyan mu mlikuy.
’tayan cimu?
ang, ’tayan cami.
c’oli na Tayal heya uyi?
ang, heya ga c’oli na Tayal.
maha kenu kayan nya ryax soni?
skinut hayi kayan nya, piyux nbu ’sya kilux.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya ryax soni?
kilux hayi kayan nya, piyux nbu ’sya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya tanux?
tyaba ci wagi nya, pumuk kbubu wah.
S.TRANSL: 太陽很大，要記得防曬戴帽子。
The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya tanux?
piyux ci yulung nya, ungat wagi kayan.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan cuxan iya?
ungat wagi cuxan iya, piyux yulung ru hopa behuy nya.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya ryax haca?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: skinut hayi ryax haca, mhtu su tanux ga posa oba.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: maha kenu kayan nya mhngi na ryax?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: mhngi na ryax ga myasa ci kayan nya.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: ba mwalax kayan nya ryax haca?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ryax haca ga myasa ci kayan nya, iyat pwalax.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: kya mwalax kayan haca?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ang, ba mwalax kayan haca.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: nyu mwalax kayan micu hani?
mswat kayan la, nyu mhtu wagi la.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: nyu mwalax kayan micu hani?
nyu mwalax la, ini cu aras ruku.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: cyu mwalax tanux?
nyu ini wala micu, suru ryax cka wagi lga ba mwalax la, mosa su tanux ga aras ruku.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: mwah kawas na kmisan ga ba skinut?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: ang, mwah kawas na kmisan ga mosa skinut ci, piyux posa lukus.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: mosa kilux ci ’bagan kawas hani?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: ang, mosa kilux ci ryax na ’bagan hani, piyux nbu ’sya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: ksli su ryax na tmangaw abaw?
ksli cu ryax na tmangaw abaw, hlhun ci kayan nya.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: ksli su ryax na mhuw abaw?
ini cu ksli ryax na mhuw abaw, piyux ci sbehuy ryax mhuw abaw.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: wa cu mungi maras biru maku la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: s’un ta mita.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: wa cu mungi maras ccong maku la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: ksyugan misu.
wa su mungi maras bbrwan la?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: aw, ksyugiy caku bbrwan su ga?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: pkani su lalu kri’an?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: kani cu pang.
pkani su lalu kgabi?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: kani cu myux.
mnani su klama la?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: nani cu baying la.
mnani su lalu kri’an?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: nani cu he welung la.
hata tmkah boru.
usa lama isu, halan misu hkani kisa.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: hata mlngya?
aw! s’un ta mosa.
hata mno boru.
iyat, hata lama mhakut biru ha.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: wa su sgus g’nux la?
ini nya, nyu cu ’mwax pyatu nya.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: wa su suwas n’wa la?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: wa cu suwas n’wa la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: wa su ’mwax pyatu la?
masu cu ’mwax pyatu la.
ca su ini pmay ’ba su?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: mwa cu mema kisa.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: cyu su mhcwa soni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: mnwah caku hkani psba biru.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: masu su m’was biru lga pcwa su la.
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: siy cu usa sali la.
masu m’was biru nku heya lga lalu tyawun nya la?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: mosa m’yugi heya la.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Yabung, cyu su maki sali?
maki, uwah miyuk.
Yabung, cyu su maki sali?
ini kaki sali ku Yabung, kinang ga Ipay, kyan lalu yaw su? mwah Yabung lga kyalun mu la.
S.TRANSL: Yabung不在家耶!我是Ipay，有什麼事嗎? 回來我會轉告Yabung。
Yabung is not at home. I am Ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: ima cimu?
uya, cami ga Uma ru Iwan, gyahi blihun.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Uma和Iwan，幫我們開門。
Grandma, we are Uma as and Iwan, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: ima ga?
kinang ga Buya, nyu cu mwah hkani Yukan.
S.TRANSL: I am Buya, I am here for Yukan.

S.FORM: uya, nyu cu mwah mita isu.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: bsya ci ini su uwah la. lungun misu calay.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Sayun, nyu cu mwah cisan isu.
S.TRANSL: Sayun, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: nahay uwah miyuk, bsya ci n_gong misu la.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: nuhi mu nanak ngahi hani, tlami mani.
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看。
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: cbing ci ngahi hani.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: uwah! nuhi mu nanak bway nni’un hani, tlami mani.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: cbing ci bway nni’un hani.
tama, nuhi mu tetun hani ini kisi iyu tlami mani.
S.TRANSL: 請坐，這是我種的有機玉米吃看看。
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: ux, cbing ci tetun hani.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: kani su ’cyung?
ini cu thoyay mani ’cyung, kani caku ringgo kinang.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: kani su pang?
ang, ksli caku ci mani.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: litan maku bway nni’un kni’an misu.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: mhway su, piyux ci bu’ nya bway hani.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: nbu ’sya.
mhway su!
piyux mani, piyux ci nhapuy mu rami.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: ux, ble ci sokan ru ble ci ni’un.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: piyux mani, nyu piyux nya.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: iyat cu cayux la!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: piyux mani, nyu piyux nya.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: piyux ci wa mu ni’un la, iyat cu kani la.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: ryax soni ga rasun cimu beh rgyax ki.
S.TRANSL: I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: kmayan yaya mu ga piyux ci putut beh rgyax ma.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: ryax soni ga rasun cimu beh cla’an ki.
S.TRANSL: I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: mosa ta moyah uraw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: mosa ta inu kisa?
rasun ta nya beh syaw llyung ku psba biru.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: mosa ta inu kisa?
rasun ta nya beh rgyax ku psba biru.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: mosa ta beh llyung kisa?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: iyat, rasun ta nya beh rgyax ku psba biru.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: mosa ta beh rgyax kisa?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: iyat, mosa ta beh cla’an kisa.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: psba biru, mosa ta mita lalu beh llyung?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: mosa ta mita nku klesay.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: psba biru, mosa ta mita lalu beh rgyax?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: mosa ta mita nku piray.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: mosa ta mhcwa beh cla’an?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: mosa ta beh cla’an ga mita nuhi ta tetun, kya cyu halan ktahi ru h’ying la!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: psba biru mosa ta mlngya beh llyung?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: iyat, mosa ta mita nku klesay.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: psba biru mosa ta muhi rami beh cla’an?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: mosa ta moyah uraw kisa.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: cyu mlaka kya klesay tey.
soni ga wa caku mita ci myanux na klesay la.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: cyu mlaka kya piray tey.
ye! wa! sli caku ci piray, myasa ci texan.
S.TRANSL: 耶! 哇! 我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: cyu mlaka kya piray tey.
iyat piray kyaca, h’ying kyaca.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: texay ta cahay ha, kya usa theya ci ki!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: ang, iyat myan mosa theya ci.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: kya tenah, thoway mkhani takuy su la.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: mnglung cu aki helaw hayi texan.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: kusa su kenu mosa tatak su?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: piray cu toruy mosa tatak mu.
kusa nya kenu mosa beh halan pkhguk?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: mkhani mosa beh halan pkhguk ku heya.
kusa su kenu mosa beh Ponghuw?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: pgluw caku glgan mlaka mosa beh Ponghuw.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: kusa su kenu mosa beh Ponghuw?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: pgluw caku xune mosa beh Ponghuw.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: pgluw su lalu mosa sali?
pgluw caku cyeyun mosa sali.
Uma pgluw su lalu mosa beh pwasan biru?
S.TRANSL: How does Uma go to school?

S.FORM: wa mluw kisya wayan beh pwasan biru ku Uma la.
S.TRANSL: Uma goes to school by train.

S.FORM: pgluw lalu mosa kyokay ku Piling?
S.TRANSL: How does Piling go to church?

S.FORM: pgluw zitensya mosa kyokay ku Piling.
S.TRANSL: Piling goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: mluw su cyeyun mosa m’was biru?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: iyat, mluw cu basu mosa m’was biru.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: mluw su zitensya mosa m’was biru?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: ang, mluw cu zitensya mosa m’was biru.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: pgluw su kisya spito mosa beh Takaw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: ang, pgluw cu kisya spito mosa Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: mosa su beh Tayto ga pgluw su kisya ga pgluw su glgan mlaka?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: pgluw cu glgan mlaka, glgan mlaka ru kisya ga helaw tehok glgan mlaka iya.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: mosa su kyokay ga pgluw su basu ga piray su toruy?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: piray cu toruy mosa beh kyakay, miray toruy ru mluw basu ga myasa miray toruy iya.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: sali su ru bbisan llamu ga sobeh?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: ini sobeh, mluw cu otobay kryax mosa beh bbisan llamu haca.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: yubing kyoku ru pwasan biru ga sobeh?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: sobeh ci, mkhani lga tehok la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: nni’an ru eki ga sobeh?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: mhtu eki lga mkhani cikah magan miray ruyux rong tmuting lga tehok la.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: kyan yaw su soni?
mhcwa?
halan misu mita ki.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: iyat cu kaki sali, kyan yaw mu soni, babaw nya la ki.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: cuxan ga kyan yaw su? halan misu hkani hmenas cka wagi ki.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: ang, n_gong misu beh sali mu.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: kyalaw misu cikah ana mu pgalan hngiyang su? brwan maku biru.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: aw ga, ana.
ana misu pgalan c’oli su?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: ya’eh texan kyasan mu, stetay ci khu mu uyi, ana ini pgaliy.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要照啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: nanu siy misu pgaliy syasing nanak la ki.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: iyat caku cyaxiy syasing uyi.
mhway su swalan caku mwah tkba yaw isu.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: ana, lalu kyalun su?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: kyalaw misu cikah, maki su mrkyas ga lalu tyawun su?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: maki lela ga knsat caku, ana ga wa caku malax la.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: kyan tyawun su micu?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: nyu caku tiyaw beh pwasan biru micu la.
kyalaw misa cikah, nyu maki beh alang ta la’i su uyi?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: ungat, cyu maki beh maci la’i maki iya.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: isu nanak utux nyu maki hani la?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: nyu cu sma’an utux hoyin ru utux piyit, utux sali maku naha uyi.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: cyu caku sma’an utux ’ngyaw uyi, kyan mnayat ta sinu sbes ga ini siy kliyang.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: tba’ay misu cikah, yaw na Gaga psani mluyak.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: ini piyux ba’un mu, ana ga ba’un mu kmayan ga kyalun misa kwara.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: y’aya na mluyak ga maki lalu psani nya?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: y’aya na mluyak ga ya’eh tringan ku knerin.
S.TRANSL: 打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: ana mosa mlu mluyak nku knerin haca?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: ba’a la, ba’a thoyay mosa mluyak knerin iya la.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Hayung, ungat uwaw sali la, usa bayi uwaw.
S.TRANSL: Hayung，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Hayung, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: cyu kyan utux supan uwaw beh ppuyan kya nya ana ini usa bayi la!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: ini tna utux ci supan, usa bayi sa’ing supan loyi.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: bayi cu uwaw bicyu, kyan ga?
S.TRANSL: I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: kyan! pisa bisun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: bayi caku sa’ing supan, bayi caku utux ckuyun kapa bwax loyi.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: nyu cahay bwax ki, lalu galun su loyi?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: bayi caku baying loyi, kyan ga?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: waya su’un bayi baying myan la.
bayi caku lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: bayi su yani kenu?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: bayi caku lukus rtung uwit nya.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: mhcwa lukus mtalah hani iya?
kyan binah na pnatas uyi?
kyan mlabuw ru mwasi nya uyi.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: bi’iy caku utux lukus mwasi nya.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Yukan mnwah su inu soni? mnwah su miyiy he?
S.TRANSL: Yukan你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Yukan, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ini, mnwah caku rmaw bayi rami uya mu.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: maha kya ga, kyan yaw su gbyan? s’un ta mani ga?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯？
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: iyat, mosa caku bayi lukus.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: mwa caku mlu isu ki.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: lokah su, pisa pila rami hani?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: utux nhlan rami hani ga pusan nutan pila.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: pisa pila ngahi hani?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: iking ngahi ga tiyun nutan pila.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: bi’iy caku sa’ing nhlan rami ru iking ngahi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Meban, wa cu mungi maras bbrwan mu la, syugay mu cikah ’ra su ga?
S.TRANSL: Meban，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Meban, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: ungat kinang uyi, ’ra Habaw kwani.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Habaw’s.

S.FORM: syugay mu cikah ga? helaw ci bi’an misu.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: ang rasi.
mhway su, mhway su say kya Habaw uyi.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Habaw for me.

S.FORM: lalu siyun su?
mwa cu smatu sa’ing biru hani.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: aw, lalu siyun su loyi?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: mosa cu ksiyu tugan biru hani loyi.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: aw la, kya yngiy tugan ryax lga wahiy smatu la.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: ini caku bi’iy ccong maku nya.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: wayan misu bi’an hesa la ha.
ca ini texi ccong maku la?
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了？
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: kya su waya syugan Sabuw la.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Sabuw?

S.FORM: ini mu ba’i, halan mu kmayan heya ha.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: syugay misu ccong mu ha.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Habaw, oba hani ga syugan su nya Piho?
S.TRANSL: Habaw, did Piho lend you this coat?

S.FORM: iyat, mnayi cu nya yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: tna ci oba mamu, cimu Piho.
S.TRANSL: Piho’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: mkalux oba nya ku heya, ini tna pnatas myan.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Xumi, wayan su syugan pila Wilang?
S.TRANSL: Xumi, did you borrow money from Wilang?

S.FORM: ang, obeh maku halan smatu soni la, mungi cu maras pila la.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: nanu knwan halan su smatu?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: cuxan halan mu smatu.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: aw, kyalun maku Wilang haca.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Wilang for you.

S.FORM: rangay iya ga tmmah olit, tlnga’ iya ga ciri olu poreh.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: kba ka san kaca, waya ini a’uw nosa mu, nanu ini caku ciri.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: nanu sba’an misu san kenu posa sa’ing toya hani.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: wa myasa ci la! maha kaca lga mwa cu ciri sinu uyi la. .
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後也會補捉到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: ruyux ci k’man cla’an la, usa beh khu magan soki kawit, hata cla’an kya.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: cyu maki inu soki kawit?
cyu maki syaw luku kya, mosa su miyuk khu lga texan su la.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍穀物乾燥簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: thoway magan, kutay su nya. mhengut ci soki kawit haca.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要割傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: iya p’un toya mu!
cyu inu toya su?
cyu maki beh kyahu khoni haca toya mu.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: ca su ba’un?
nyu maku bbiru cahay, nanu ba’un maku cyu inu toya mu.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: tara ’cyux kwe, han ta posa gong ga kmiyak ’cyux.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: cami ga ungat tara myan kmiyak ’cyux, ana ga pnek myan cami.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: ini myan pnek cami, babaw nya mwah su lga sba’iy caku la ki?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有釣魚，你下次來就教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: ang, nanu s’un ta mosa pnek ’cyux la ki.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!那麼我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: nanu babaw nya sba’an misu san kenu kle tara ’cyux.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: cyu miyiy boli su la, kya cyu ciri ’cyux! nahay lhoyiy.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: ini ha, lokah ci miyiy xune hani la, lhoyun mu cahay boli pnekan hani, usa magan ami haca isu.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: lhoyiy kura cahay ’cyux haca, khlolay ta mholuy.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我們一起拉。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: alagay myasa, piyux ci nagan ta soni tey, spun kwara takin hani.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: helaw hayi hata la, hay ta m’asu naha uyi.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: nyan psba biru la.
iya gno la, nahay tama tman.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: swali caku, nyu caku msu’i la.
nahay uwah miyuk.
te pisa ryax hngawan soni?
te magan ryax hngawan soni, mhngi cuxan, hata ms’un mtisan.
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧。
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: aw ga ! hata beh llyung.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: te pisa ryax hngawan cuxan iya?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: te tugan ryax hngawan cuxan, hata mahi boru cuxan ’lyan ga.
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去打球吧。
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: ungat lalu yaw su cuxan sasan?
S.TRANSL: 你明天早上沒有什麼事?
What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: cuxan ga ryax hngawan, pgluw cu yaya mu mosa Kyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: cyu su mhcwa?
pputa’ caku la, mosa caku bukan ha.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: tkging ci tunux mu.
hngi srapa’ kya ha.
psba biru, ga’ing ci nbwas mu, mosa caku bukan ha.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: aw, nahay usa.
ana caku mosa mema ’ba?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: obeh mhngi m’wasan biru la, usa kisa.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: psba biru, ga’ing ci tunux mu, psina caku mhngi ’lyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: aw, pnba lungan mosa sali wah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: psba biru, mwah hngawan te utux ryax hani ga psina caku mhngi, mosa cu pkita pkhguk.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: aw, ble mlahang he su.
cyu inu Habaw?
cyu ga’ing nbwas nya, wayan bukan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: cyu inu Yukan?
psba biru, cyu ga’ing olu Yukan, wan lama psina mhngi soni la.
S.TRANSL: 老師，Yukan喉嚨痛，今天先請假了。
Teacher, Yukan has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: ca ini uwah Habaw nya?
cyu mkilux tunux nya.
kayan cikah ima isu.
Piling Piho lalu mu, mpu kawas mu la.
S.TRANSL: My name is Piling Piho, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: ima lalu su?
Take Piling lalu mu.
la’i su nya Tayal?
S.TRANSL: Are you ethnic group from the Atayal?

S.FORM: ang, la’i cu nya Tayal.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我是泰雅族的小孩。

S.FORM: tayan kwara c’oli utux sali su?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: ang, Tayal kwara c’oli utux sali mu.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是泰雅族人。
Yes, my whole family is Atayal.

S.FORM: tayan kwara c’oli utux sali su?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: iyat, yaba mu ga Tayal, yaya mu ga Tewan.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是泰雅族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Atayal, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: ima la’i isu?
la’i caku nya Yukan Piho.
yaba su kwaca? pisa kawas nya la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了？
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: mtiyu pgan kawas nya la.
yaba su kwaca? pisa kawas nya la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了？
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: iyat, bkis alang myan kwaca, mspat pgan kawas nya la.
S.TRANSL: 不是，是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pisa kawas suyan su likuy la?
mpu spat kawas suyan mu likuy la.
cimu suyan su likuy ga mhenas piyux ci kawas hopa heya?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: mhenas hopa magan kawas heya.
pisa bawi su la?
tehok kbhun mspatun si’em bawi mu.
bsya ini ta pkita la, wa su bawi loyi.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: awha, tehok kbhun mtiyun si’em bawi mu la.
cyu su thuy la?
ini, cyu su mn’u mita la.
cyu su mhekan la?
ini, nyu caku thuy la.
cyu su thuy la ga?
angu, tehok mtiyun kongkin thuy he maku micu la.
mosa su inu?
mosa caku beh bbrwan ptyawun hkani psba biru.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Yawi, mosa su inu?
mosa caku pbuling ayah.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: cyu inu Yawi?
cyu beh lngya’an kya, heya ka mosa pcpung mlngya kisa.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: cyu inu Yabung? heya mosa pcpung t’enah kisa.
S.TRANSL: Yabung在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Yabung? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: cyu beh lhoyan crxan kya, halan maku smuy.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: s’un ta mosa unroba kya.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: mosa caku lama bayi ni’un kryaxan ha, halan misu hkani kisa.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: pgluw ta mosa meli sbing ha!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: usa hkani c’oli, mosa caku hkani psba biru.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Takun, mosa su pcpung msilay boru kisa ?
S.TRANSL: Is Takun competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: iyat, heya ka mosa pcpung khotun bawi.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: mosa su pcpung ps’es ryax unrokay haca?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: ang, mosa caku pcpung t’enah.
mosa su pcpung ps’es ryax unrokay haca?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: mosa caku pcpung msilay boru
lalu ptyawun ta ps’es ryax unrokay haca?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: pcpung ta pholuy snyu.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: ps’es ryax unrokay haca ga pbayiy ta nni’un?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: iyat, pbayiy ta guseng.
lokah su ci, isu mnagan te utux cnrxan!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: mhway su.
cyu kya sali uya?
cyu kya, cyu m’abi beh ’byan nya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: cyu kya sali uya?
ungat, wayan tanux micu hani, gbyan mosa mwah sali la.
S.TRANSL: 沒有，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: cyu kya sali uba?
cyu beh yatux bawi sali, karaw haliy hkani kya.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: kyan c’oli maki sali?
isu Wilang ga, bsya ci ini misu texi la, lokah su?
S.TRANSL: 是Wilang你阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Wilang. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: lokah, nyu caku mwah cisan isu.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: cyu inu yaba su?
cyu beh puyan kya phapuy rami, halan mu smuy.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: wayan inu Cmyax?
wayan kmiyak welung beh libu walung kya.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: uba , nyan cami la.
ini aki sali uba mamu, cyu maki beh cla’an, naga beh sali mamu.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: ’nyan mama su la.
bsya ci ini misu texi la, wa su bawi la.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: m’es caku ci texan misu mwah.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: bne mu cimu kaway hani, hali posa tl’tu pskuw kya.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的李子，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: ca bsya ci ini su uwah la, mosa cu tmapeh kwara naha ms’un ta mani myux.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: ana la, nbu cu ocya lga myasa la, hata mtisan beh wahan tama c’oli kya.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: mhway ci spkani su kinang, mosa caku la.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: knut mu micu welung hani, rasi thwayi mani.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: pstna ta cuxan ’lyan ga?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: aw, pstna ta beh inu?
pstna ta beh pwasan biru ga? mosa ta pgalan lutux c’oli.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: hata beh pslyan kya, plukus caku lukus Tayal mosa.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: myasa ci texan sakura alang myan, gmyah phpah nya lga uwah la ki.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你再來吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: n’gon beta tmangaw abaw lga , msu’i ci la.
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太遲了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: uwah s’esan ryax na kmloh la.
S.TRANSL: 那你豐年祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: aw la, m’es caku ci mnaga uwah ryax haca.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我很期待那天的到來!
Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: ca su mosa maki alang rgyah loyi?
S.TRANSL: 你為甚麼又要回到部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: mosa caku psba biru kya.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: ca su ini psba biru beh alang b’nux?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: baha mcwa llungun mu ci alang maku rgyax, aki kyan lalu ccyuk maku mtiyaw yaw alang.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，我也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: kba’an su ci tminun gey, ima psba isu?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: sba’an caku nya uya mu, maki alang myan rgyax ga heya kba ci tminun.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶教我的，她是我們部落最會織布的。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: ca su nglung tkba tminun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: tminun hani ga gaga myan, nglung caku mubuy yaw na gaga.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: uwaw trakis hani ga ble ci nbun.
kinang nanak wa p’uwaw kwani.
kba su ci gey, bsya tyawun p’uwaw hani?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: ini, utux hngawan lga masu la. lman sklwan trakis ru pagay hkay ha, s’un magun tamun lga, ana kupun beh cahuy slaman la.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: lalu kwara cyu su tbisun?
nyu kya ’ryux ru inu, nuhi mu nanak kwara kwani.
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: bisun mu sa’ing hani pisa pila?
kwara ga sa’ing kbhun myiman pila.
sli mu ci lukus hani, pisa pila?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: magan kbhun pila kwani.
hmet ci la, ana cikuy cikah ga?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: ini ba’i ki, cikuy loyi ga ungat galun maku pila la.
S.TRANSL: 不好意思，再低我會虧錢。
No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: ana la! nanu bayi caku utux lukus mkalux.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: bayi caku kutan rami ru limuk hani.
S.TRANSL: 我要買這把菜刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: sa’ing seng pila kwara, knle mu nanak kwani, bsya ci ckaw.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: aras caku spkita lpyung mwah bayi, aki su hmway cikah ga?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: aw la, ana hmway cikah.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: uwah mita cikah ow, nyu caku pbayiy lukus ru kbubu uyi.
S.TRANSL: 來看一下喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: pisa pila lukus iya?
utux lukus ga tugan kbhun myiman pila, tugan ga utux seng pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: bayi caku utux lga masu la, bi’iy cu mganus nya.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: myasa su, nglung caku bayi sumun ru m’aw musu cu he ’syang.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: waya su’un tbayi sumun la, nyu kya pang nira iya, bayi su?
S.TRANSL: 糯米飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: aw la , bi’i caku utux, mwah caku bayi myux babaw nya loyi.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: aw, ckuyay maku yubing kapa ha, myiman pila kwani.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
